        public FileObservable.Builder startPosition(long startPosition)
        The startPosition in bytes in the file to commence the tail from. 0 = start of file. Defaults to 0.
        Parameters:
        startPosition -
        Returns:
        this

      • sampleTimeMs

        public FileObservable.Builder sampleTimeMs(long sampleTimeMs)
        Specifies sampling to apply to the source observable (which could be very busy if a lot of writes are occurring for example). Sampling is only applied to file updates (MODIFY and OVERFLOW), file creation events are always passed through. File deletion events are ignored (in fact are not requested of NIO).
        Parameters:
        sampleTimeMs -
        Returns:
        this

      • chunkSize

        public FileObservable.Builder chunkSize(int chunkSize)
        Emissions from the tailed file will be no bigger than this.
        Parameters:
        chunkSize -
        Returns:
        this

        public FileObservable.Builder charset(Charset charset)
        The charset of the file. Only used for tailing a text file.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
